trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfoBase"></xref> that uses this collection to define parameter information for the service operation that it represents.

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> to an Array, starting at a particular Array index.

trans-unit.target: Matrice unidimensionale che costituisce la destinazione degli elementi copiati da <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The Array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: La matrice deve avere un'indicizzazione in base zero.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero `array` da cui avviare la copia.
